page.title: 07AKEMAN STREET
page.content: Akeman Street is the course of an old Roman road which runs from one side of our area to the other. Akeman Street forms part of the Oxfordshire way and runs through Stonesfield steps, Littleworth farm, Akeman Street Farm, Blenheim park and near the site of a Roman Villa. A Roman coin which was found 1911 may be something to do with the roman road. The man in charge at Akeman Street Farm said that he did not mind Akeman Street running through his farm because it does not get very many people walking along it.
